Dr. Jacobs Face & Body Wash Castile Liquid Soap, Charcoal (2018 formulation)

Brand: Dr. Jacobs

Category: Body Wash/Cleanser

Ingredients: PURIFIED WATER, SAPONOFIED COCONUT OIL, SOPONOFIED OLIVE OIL, POTASSIUM OLEATE, SEA SALT, COCO GLUCOSIDE, VEGETABLE GLYCERIN, CLARY SAGE AND LAVENDER OIL BLEND, CITRIC ACID, ACTIVATED CHARCOAL, ALOE VERA, VITAM

AL, ALOE VERA, VITAMIN E.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
